entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 13.
